text: Did something with the build configuration get updated recently. Looking at <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/40361> and the `illegal instruction` + the later `Symbol not found: _clock_gettime` suggest that something with that has updated?

text: I don't think we've changed anything recently. Openblas is a fat library with all microarchitectures bundled together, maybe it's detecting the architecture incorrectly?

elements.text: I don't think we've changed anything recently. Openblas is a fat library with all microarchitectures bundled together, maybe it's detecting the architecture incorrectly?

text: Hm, but <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/40343> only added <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/pull/2769> to the library (I think!) so that shouldn't really have changed anything w.r.t issues seen?

elements.text: to the library (I think!) so that shouldn't really have changed anything w.r.t issues seen?

text: Yes, it's strange. Also the `_clock_gettime` error is weird, the new patch only touches Fortran code
